field.label: Remote AS mode
field.help: "Use Remote AS Number" will use the number specified in the "Remote AS" field, while "External" or "Internal" will ignore it in favor of the alternative "remote-as internal" and "remote-as external" settings.

field.label: Remote AS
field.help: Remote AS for the peer group.

field.label: Address Family
field.help: Select which address families to activate for this peer group.

field.label: Listen Ranges
field.help: Enter one or multiple IP networks in CIDR notation. Accept connections from any peers in the specified prefix.

field.label: Update-Source Interface
field.help: Physical IPv4 interface facing the peer.

field.label: Next-Hop-Self
field.help: Sets the local router as the next hop for routes advertised to the neighbor, commonly used in Route Reflector setups.

field.label: Send Defaultroute
field.help: Enable sending of default routes to the peer group.

field.label: Prefix-List In
field.help: Prefix list to filter inbound prefixes from this neighbor.

field.label: Prefix-List Out
field.help: Prefix list to filter outbound prefixes sent to this neighbor.

field.label: Route-Map In
field.help: Route-map to apply to routes received from this neighbor.

field.label: Route-Map Out
field.help: Route-map to apply to routes advertised to this neighbor.
